mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT B.*,T.*, M.MEM_NICK,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTS WHERE BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND COMM_STATUS = 'Y') COMM_COUNT FROM BOARD B, MEMBER M, BOARDTYPE T WHERE BOARD_STATUS='Y' AND M.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO AND B.TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC, BOARD_NO DESC
